original_text:
when calamity overtakes you like a storm,
    when disaster sweeps over you like a whirlwind,
    when distress and trouble overwhelm you.
korean_text: 너희의 두려움이 광풍 같이 임하겠고 너희의 재앙이 폭풍 같이 이르겠고 너희에게 근심과 슬픔이 임하리니

sentences.original_text: when calamity overtakes you like a storm
when disaster sweeps over you like a whirlwind
when distress and trouble overwhelm you
